item.title: New wildy zone help?
item.dc:creator: @Ikoedlalampara Ikoedlalampara
item.description:
@Ikoedlalampara wrote:

Error:

[code].\client.java:13432: illegal start of expression
&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && a
bsX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && ab
sY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3099 && absX <= 3135 && absY >= 9920 && abs
Y <=9941 ) || absX >= 1866 && absX <= 5317 && absY >= 5330 && absY <=5317 ) {

       ^

.\client.java:13432: not a statement
&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && a
bsX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && ab
sY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3099 && absX <= 3135 && absY >= 9920 && abs
Y <=9941 ) || absX >= 1866 && absX <= 5317 && absY >= 5330 && absY <=5317 ) {

                                                               ^

.\client.java:13432: ‘;’ expected
&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && a
bsX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && ab
sY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3099 && absX <= 3135 && absY >= 9920 && abs
Y <=9941 ) || absX >= 1866 && absX <= 5317 && absY >= 5330 && absY <=5317 ) {

                                                                     ^

3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Wilderness area code:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3099 && absX <= 3135 && absY >= 9920 && absY <=9941 ) || absX >= 1866 && absX <= 5317 && absY >= 5330 && absY <=5317 ) { return true; }

What am i doing wrong?
